title: "Match Found" notification issue
body:
I've had this really big issue with my client for months now, but over the last few weeks it's gotten pretty bad.  When I'm tabbed out of league while searching for a match, I'll quite often hear the "Match Found" sound, but even if I tab back to league within about half a second it tells me I've failed to respond (and sometimes if I click accept it comes up with "Active Game Not Found").  Occasionally when I actually tab over fast enough to see the timer itself, I can see it cancel itself and bring up the failed to respond popup, even when the timer hasn't even reached the halfway mark.  Used to not be so bad, but recently it feels like it's gotten worse and the client has started telling me I'll be punished if I keep failing to respond, which forces me to do nothing but sit and stare at the client for up to 5 minutes while waiting for a game.

Anyone else had this?
